title: Appendix – LLM Draft & Commentary
section: ✍️ Commentary – What I Used and Edited
text:
✍️ Commentary – What I Used and Edited
I used the LLM output as inspiration to: - Structure the layout (bio, experience, skills, etc.) - Draft the initial text for my summary and skills - Adapt Bootstrap icons and Google Translate suggestion
All final text was revised and rewritten in my own voice for authenticity and accuracy.

title: About this site
text: This portfolio was created as part of an MBA assignment at University Canada West. The page highlights my experience, skills, and professional background in a concise digital format.

title: Kleber Jose Cabrini
text:
MBA Candidate · Strategic Leadership · Sales & Operations · Bilingual Professional



Welcome! I am an MBA candidate at University Canada West with over 20 years of leadership experience in sales, operations, and strategy across Brazil and Canada.
I am passionate about business transformation, performance improvement, and leading high-impact teams to deliver results.


📧 kjc1977ca@outlook.com · 🔗 LinkedIn 📄 Download Resume

title: Contact
text:
You can reach me through the following channels:

📍 location: New Westminster, BC, Canada
📧 Email: kjc1977ca@outlook.com
🔗 LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/kleber-cabrini


For additional documents or requests, feel free to reach out directly by email

title: Professional Experience
text:
Sales Representative
FD WOW Food Inc. · Canada - Oct 2024 - Present*

Developed new clients base and executed tasting campaigns in retail and farmers’ markets.
Supervised in-store promotional teams and represented brand at SGF business fair.



Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Seikou Business Management · Brazil - Jan 2022 - Present*
For Company ODAIR PNEUS LTDA, Brazil

Provide consulting to tire retailers in 390+ cities.
Recruited, trained, and managed national sales teams.
Implemented ERP migration and restructured KPI system to drive performance.

For Company LATICÍNIOS DA FAZENDA, Brazil

Implementation of Sales Team
Establishment of KPIs for performance control of the Sales Team
Guidance on building Sales Budget



Director of Operations
ZD Food S.A. · Brazil - Jan 2020-Dec 2021*

Oversaw all operations: procurement, processing, logistics, and distribuition.
Reduced costs by consolidating operations and optimizing supply chain.
Managed 300+ staff and improved talent retention.



Sales Manager
ZD Food S.A., · Brazil - 1994-2019*

Achieved 350% increase in dairy production (2018-2019).
Developed pricing and margin strategies that exceeded sales targets annually.
Led a 50-person sales team across national territory (Brazil).
